short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert currency, length, mass and temperature in a matter of seconds with Conversion Duck! It is completely free and easy to use.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Quick and free conversions
- Easily copy result to clipboard
- User-friendly and intuitive interface

The extension uses dark mode according to your device settings.

Font size scales depending on your browser's font size.

Exchange rates used are updated hourly via internet connection. If offline or experiencing outages, older information may be used.

Conversion Duck will never collect or sell your data.
